Eagle

[show private | hide private]
[frames | no frames]

Module Hierarchy

  • eagle: Eagle is an abstraction layer atop Graphical Toolkits focused on making simple applications easy to build while powerful in features.

Class Hierarchy

  • __builtin__.object: The most base type
    • gobject.GObject: Object GObject...
      • gtk.Object: Object GtkObject...

                • eagle._Panel: Internal widget to arrange components.
                  • eagle._HPanel: Internal widget to arrange components horizontally.
                  • eagle._VPanel: Internal widget to arrange components vertically.
            • gtk.Table: Object GtkTable Signals from GObject: notify (GParam) Signals from GtkObject: destroy () Signals from GtkWidget: show () hide () map () unmap () realize () unrealize ()               • eagle._Table: Internal widget to arrange components in tabular form.
    • __builtin__.type: type(object) -> the object's type type(name, bases, dict) -> a new type
    • eagle._EGObject: The basic Eagle Object.
      • eagle.App: An application window.
      • eagle.Image: An image that can be loaded from files or binary data and saved to files.
      • eagle._EGWidget: The base of every Graphical Component in Eagle.
        • eagle.Button: A push button.
          • eagle.AboutButton: Push button to show AboutDialog of App.
          • eagle.CloseButton: Push button to close App.
          • eagle.HelpButton: Push button to show HelpDialog of App.
          • eagle.OpenFileButton: Push button to show dialog to choose an existing file.
          • eagle.PreferencesButton: Push button to show PreferencesDialog of App.
          • eagle.QuitButton: Push button to quit all Apps.
          • eagle.SaveFileButton: Push button to show dialog to choose a file to save.
          • eagle.SelectFolderButton: Push button to show dialog to choose an existing folder/directory.
        • eagle.Canvas: The drawing area.
        • eagle.Group: Group of various components.
        • eagle.HSeparator: Horizontal separator
        • eagle.Label: Text label
        • eagle.VSeparator: Horizontal separator
        • eagle._EGDataWidget: The base of every Eagle widget that holds data.
          • eagle.CheckBox: Check box.
          • eagle._EGWidLabelEntry: Widget that holds a label and an associated Entry.
            • eagle.Color: Button to select colors.
            • eagle.Entry: Text entry.
              • eagle.Password: Password entry.
            • eagle.Font: Button to select fonts.
            • eagle.Progress: Progress bar.
            • eagle.Selection: Selection box (aka Combo box).
            • eagle.Spin: Spin button entry.
              • eagle.IntSpin: Integer-only Spin button.
                • eagle.UIntSpin: Unsigned integer-only Spin button.
        • eagle.AboutDialog: A window that displays information about the application.
        • eagle.FileChooser: A dialog to choose a file.
        • eagle.HelpDialog: A window that displays application help.
        • eagle.PreferencesDialog: A dialog to present user with preferences.
      • eagle.DebugDialog: Dialog to show uncaught exceptions.
    • eagle.AutoGenId: Mix-In to auto-generate ids.
      • eagle.AboutButton: Push button to show AboutDialog of App.
      • eagle.App: An application window.
      • eagle.CloseButton: Push button to close App.
      • eagle.HelpButton: Push button to show HelpDialog of App.
      • eagle.HSeparator: Horizontal separator
      • eagle.Image: An image that can be loaded from files or binary data and saved to files.
      • eagle.Label: Text label
      • eagle.OpenFileButton: Push button to show dialog to choose an existing file.
      • eagle.PreferencesButton: Push button to show PreferencesDialog of App.
      • eagle.QuitButton: Push button to quit all Apps.
      • eagle.SaveFileButton: Push button to show dialog to choose a file to save.
      • eagle.SelectFolderButton: Push button to show dialog to choose an existing folder/directory.
      • eagle.AboutDialog: A window that displays information about the application.
      • eagle.DebugDialog: Dialog to show uncaught exceptions.
      • eagle.FileChooser: A dialog to choose a file.
      • eagle.HelpDialog: A window that displays application help.
      • eagle.PreferencesDialog: A dialog to present user with preferences.
